name: Realms of Conquest (itch)
description:
Introduction

This prototype seeks to see if by applying new technologies, in this case virtual reality, users are interested in this genre that has been closed in its niche.

If you can't test the prototype, watching the video and answering the form helps me!

Link to the form:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1TOH9pMCBDAojl4V4Uwa70ILqc2ldDoXhVlp7N3hwi2Y/edi...

Description

Realms of Conquest is a prototype of RTS applying virtual reality, inspired by classic games like Age of Empires or Warcraft III. You must put yourself in the shoes of a commander in order to conquer the enemy kingdom.

Gameplay

This prototype shows what could be a first level of a game. You have just landed on the shores of Olmus where the enemies are gathering to prepare an attack. The time is right, so you must get to work to grow both the town and your army.

Main Features Build your settlement:

Different buildings to grow the village, each with its own functionality

Immersion: 

Not only can you build or manage troops, you can also be another villager. Take the role of commander and help the town to get faster resources or go into battle with your troops. (Remember that without a commander you are doomed to defeat!)

Other Features
  • Choose your own game style: Each commander will have their own strategies, choose which one suits your game style
  • Seasons
